M

mainAnimation - Variable in class moulton.scalable.visuals.AnimatedButton
The image drawn on the face of the button when not clicked.
maintainAspectRatio - Variable in class moulton.scalable.visuals.AnimatedView
Whether or not the view should draw the image in the same ratio as given or should stretch it to fill the area of the view.
maintainAspectRatio - Variable in class moulton.scalable.visuals.View
Whether the view should draw the image in the same ratio as given or should stretch it to fill the area of the view.
maxMessages - Variable in class moulton.scalable.texts.TextHistory
The maximum number of messages saved.
menu - Variable in class moulton.scalable.containers.MenuManager
The panel that will serve as the menu.
MenuComponent - Class in moulton.scalable.utils
The parent class for all components to fit inside of a parent panel.
MenuComponent(Panel, int, int) - Constructor for class moulton.scalable.utils.MenuComponent
Sets the parent panel for this component.
MenuComponent(Panel, String, String) - Constructor for class moulton.scalable.utils.MenuComponent
Sets the parent panel and coordinate MenuComponent.x and MenuComponent.y values for this component.
MenuManager - Class in moulton.scalable.containers
The menu manager will handle the rendering of its menu on a graphics object through MenuManager.render(Graphics).
MenuManager(Container) - Constructor for class moulton.scalable.containers.MenuManager
Saves the cont field as MenuManager.cont.
message - Variable in class moulton.scalable.texts.TextBox
The display string of the text box.
moulton.scalable.clickables - package moulton.scalable.clickables
The clickables package contains classes that pertain to menu components that can be clicked.
moulton.scalable.containers - package moulton.scalable.containers
The containers package contains classes that are intended for holding menu components, especially panel classes which serve as nodes in the menu rendering tree structure.
moulton.scalable.draggables - package moulton.scalable.draggables
The draggables package contains clickable subclasses that are intended to be dragged or scrolled.
moulton.scalable.geometrics - package moulton.scalable.geometrics
The geometrics package contains classes pertaining to primarily to aesthetics, such as lines and polygons.
moulton.scalable.popups - package moulton.scalable.popups
The popups package contains the Popup class, from which all pop ups derive, as well as implementations of two common pop up usages- a notification pop up and a confirmation pop up.
moulton.scalable.texts - package moulton.scalable.texts
The texts package contains classes and menu components that ar primarily dedicated to holding and processing text for display in the menu.
moulton.scalable.utils - package moulton.scalable.utils
The utils package contains classes that serve general utility function.
moulton.scalable.visuals - package moulton.scalable.visuals
The visuals package contains classes that relate to images and animations.
mouseClickXY - Variable in class moulton.scalable.texts.TextBox
The pixel point of the last mouse click.
mouseMoved(int, int) - Method in class moulton.scalable.containers.MenuManager
This will report to the selected Draggable how much the mouse has moved since the draggable was first clicked.
mousePressed - Variable in class moulton.scalable.containers.MenuManager
Whether the mouse is currently pressed.
mousePressed(int, int) - Method in class moulton.scalable.containers.MenuManager
The Moulton Scalable Menus handles the mouse press once this method has been called by a mouse listener external to Moulton Scalable Menus.
mousePressed(int, int, Collection<MenuComponent>) - Method in class moulton.scalable.containers.MenuManager
internal recursive mousePressed call
mouseReleased(int, int) - Method in class moulton.scalable.containers.MenuManager
The Moulton Scalable Menus handles the mouse release once this method has been called by another source.
mouseScrolled(int, int, int) - Method in class moulton.scalable.containers.MenuManager
Call this when the mouse is scrolled.
mouseX - Variable in class moulton.scalable.containers.MenuManager
mouseX and mouseY are the coordinates of the mouse when a mouse button is first pressed.
mouseY - Variable in class moulton.scalable.containers.MenuManager
mouseX and mouseY are the coordinates of the mouse when a mouse button is first pressed.
